summary: Ladies and gentlemen, Today I introduce to you: The Lydia Replacement Mod
descriptionHtml:
If you're using one of my mods for the first time you should note-------------------------------------------------
1. I translate and import files from Chinese gaming forums
2. Chinese copyright laws do not affect any other country, and vice versa
3. I still do my best to try and credit the authors of the mods I upload

Introduction--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Because: Lydia? You'll never be the man she was
Ladies and gentlemen, Today I introduce to you: The Lydia Replacement Mod

Description---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- It already comes with female skin/texture renewals
-You can replace the ones you already have with skin renewals (fem), It depends on what you like, you can keep your current ones if you wish.
-If you use NMM to install you might encounter conflicts with the texture skin renewals, because the Mod include it's own

If you encounter a problem-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please try and solve it among yourselves if possible, for I am only the up loader of this mod

Credits---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
bbs.3dmgames.com
author: berniem4483
